matt.name: Matt Weaver-Yuwono
matt.shortBio: Data-driven asset allocation for the modern era.

data.bio: With a background in quantitative finance, Matt oversees the liquid portfolio and venture capital allocations. He believes in the synthesis of traditional value investing and modern data science.
